report_title: Contract Management Consulting in the US
executive_summary: Over the past five years, the patent cliff, an ongoing series of expiration dates for the patents on blockbuster drugs, has stimulated the volume of research and development (R&D) work outsourced by generic pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies, promoting growth for consultants. The outbreak of COVID-19 led to growth for consultants as pharmaceutical manufacturers ramped up R&D expenditures to develop new drugs and looked to consultants to sure up their operations.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Consultants Enjoyed Growth Amid the Outbreak of COVID-19
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Uncertainty surrounding the outbreak of COVID-19 led pharmaceutical manufacturers to rely on consultants to sure up their operations.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Expiring Patents and Developing Complexity Have Promoted Growth
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The impending expiration of patents for brand-name pharmaceuticals has driven companies to invest in developing new products to offset any revenue declines because of patent expirations, spurring growth.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: MERGER AND ACQUISITION ACTIVITY BY PHARMACEUTICAL MANUFACTURERS HAS BENEFITTED CONSULTANTS
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The pressure of expiring patents and high research and development costs have attracted pharmaceutical manufacturers to mergers and acquisitions to grow revenue and expand capabilities.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: AN UPTICK IN OUTSOURCING TO PROMOTE GROWTH
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Pressure from third-party payers to reduce drug costs will remain a significant issue for pharmaceutical manufacturers, driving manufacturers' need for consultants.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: THE CHANGING REGULATORY ENVIRONMENT TO BENEFIT CONSULTANTS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Health insurance payers and regulators wanting tangible results from clinical trials will drive many pharmaceutical companies to purchase services from consultants.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: VIRTUAL DRUG DISCOVERY MODELS PROVIDE CONSULTANTS WITH AN AVENUE OF GROWTH
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Large pharmaceutical companies will adopt virtual drug discovery models for small molecule drugs to secure clinical proof before launching a drug, so development is outsourced as much as possible.

industry_definition: This industry provides consulting to pharmaceutical companies, which includes the assessment of cost structures and client contracting processes. Firms ensure compliance and track performance. This can include the development and implementation of software for these purposes.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level low - steady

threats: Number of people with private health insurance

market_segmentation.segment_description: Management consultants provide strategies to help manufacturers streamline their production process for fast-growing markets, including diagnostics, vaccines, new drugs and orphan drugs.
Since pharmacies are the key buyers of generic drugs, management consultants can provide expertise about securing favorable contracts with pharmacists and doctors.
Management consultants provide expertise to medical device manufacturers producing products like magnetic resonance imaging equipment, medical ultrasound equipment and pacemakers.
Management consultants provide expertise about whether or not an OTC drug manufacturer should develop a low-cost OTC medication or focus on product differentiation.

products_and_services.product_or_service: BUSINESS STRATEGY AND PLANNING CONSULTING SERVICES
products_and_services.product_description: Pharmaceutical contract management consultants determine how contracts can assist pharmaceutical companies in achieving their short-term and long-term objectives.
Management consultants provide some clients with financial consulting services to streamline capital and cashflow management.

products_and_services.product_or_service: MARKETING STRATEGY AND MARKET DEVELOPMENT SERVICES
products_and_services.product_description: Pharmaceutical contract management consultants focus on how having contract manufacturing may impact clients' brand positioning and determine potential changes to resource allocation.

products_and_services.product_or_service: OPERATIONS AND SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT SERVICES
products_and_services.product_description: This segment includes supply chain strategies, like efficiently distributing products manufactured by clients and contract manufacturers.
Management consultants provide human resources and technical consulting and other strategic management services, including actuarial consulting services, among other services.
Management consultants provide human resources and technical consulting and other strategic management services, including actuarial consulting services, among other services.

tier_1_suppliers: Consumer Electronics Stores in the US
Computer & Packaged Software Wholesaling in the US
tier_1_buyers: Generic Pharmaceutical Manufacturing in the US
tier_2_buyers: Vitamin & Supplement Manufacturing in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Consultants Have Enjoyed Growth From Business Strategy and Planning Consulting Services
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Pharmaceutical contract management consultants determine how contracts will assist companies with targeting customers and analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of insourcing versus outsourcing.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Customers' Increased Need for Compliance Consulting Has Led to an Uptick in Financial Consulting Services
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Clients have demanded compliance consulting, with compliance processes potentially reducing risk and lowering error costs, leading to growth in this segment.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: CONSULTANTS TO ENJOY GROWTH BY PROVIDING MARKETING STRATEGY AND MARKET DEVELOPMENT SERVICES
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Consultants strategize how increasing clients' access to input commodities (e.g., active pharmaceutical ingredients) via contracted API production enables clients to retain their market share.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: SUPPLY CHAIN WOES HAVE INCREASED EXPENDITURE ON OPERATIONS AND SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT SERVICES
demand_determinants.determinant_description: COVID-19-induced supply chain woes have pushed up downstream markets' expenditure on this segment.

regulations_points.regulation_description: Pharmaceutical contract management consultants enjoy a light level of regulation.

barriers_points.barrier_description: The greatest barrier to entry for new entrants is attracting and retaining skilled workers with established reputations or networks of clients.

basis_points.basis_description: Internal competition is high among consultants.
Consultants face various forms of external competition.

concentration_points.concentration_title: Multitude of services keeps concentration low
concentration_points.concentration_description: The industry is highly fragmented because of the many services in pharmaceutical contract management consultants' portfolios.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Wages are expected to climb to account for 49.6% of industry revenue in 2023.
Other costs are expected to decrease to account for 31.0% of industry revenue in 2023.
Profit is expected to fall to account for 12.0% of industry revenue in 2023.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The greatest barrier to entry for new entrants is attracting and retaining skilled workers.
The major markets for this industry are highly concentrated.

volatility_points.volatility_title: Business and Government Activity Impact Volatility
volatility_points.volatility_description: Economic conditions impact pharmaceutical companies' research and development and advisory expenditures.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: Business strategy and planning consulting services
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Pharmaceutical contract management consultants help establishment.

FAQs.question: How have economic changes influenced consumer demand for pharmaceuticals?
FAQs.answer: The bill increased oversight for over-the-counter (OTC) drugs.

FAQs.question: Does your company rely heavily on demand from a single, key market?
FAQs.answer: Unlike other consulting industries, pharmaceutical contract management consultants cater only to pharmaceutical manufacturers.

FAQs.question: How have rising labor costs affected your company's operations?
FAQs.answer: Consulting firms have relatively low purchase costs and mainly rely on labor.

FAQs.question: To what degree is your company's operations capital intensive?
FAQs.answer: Capital expenses for consulting firms include third party research and analysis services.

FAQs.question: Have you been able to minimize/reduce wage costs through automation?
FAQs.answer: While consulting is labor intensive, some online processes can be automated to reduce costs.

FAQs.question: How does your company comply with regulatory requirements?
FAQs.answer: One of the main goals of pharmaceutical contract management consulting is to help manufacturers comply with regulations.

FAQs.question: How has the COVID-19 pandemic affected your company's profitability?
FAQs.answer: On average profit has grown for consulting firms over the past five years.

FAQs.question: Is your company looking to significantly expand its operations sometime in the near future?
FAQs.answer: Rising demand for consulting services has created opportunities for companies to grow and expand.
